name: the spice market
notes:
*** this cal is canceled, a full statement is on my website – if you buy the pattern you get the full pattern at once in any language available. people who already bought the pattern receive an update or update your libary. ***
---------------------------------------------------------------

due the huge attention for this pattern, i donated $1000 dollars of the purchases from this pattern to the wwf australia to rebuild nature and wildlife due the heavy fires. 
———————————————————————————

welcome to the spice market ! a exotic journey that will take you along some different spice markets through the entire middle-eastern part of our world. filled with noise, the smell of spices and herbs and rich colors this pattern holds all elements to reflect those typical things.

i designed this blanket in three different versions :

cinnamon and rosewater which is made in scheepjes sugar rush, this is a laceweight version.

saffron and ginger which is made in scheepjes cotton 8, this is a fingering weight version.

lavender and mint which is made in scheepjes colour crafter, this is a dk weight version.

all amounts, sizes and hooksizes can be found in the materials pdf file which you can download after purchase or visit my blog where you can download it for free.

there are also some other details which needs to be named for this pattern. everything you need to know is in a tips and tricks pdf file which you can also download after purchase or download for free on my blog as well. however, i will again name the most important 


•	the skill level to join this cal would be intermediate. although stitch work isn’t really hard and most of the things are pretty clear, you might need some experience to join in.
•	there are no videos or charts made for this pattern.
•	stitches used can be found in the tips and tricks files.
•please start off with making the swatch which is in the tips and tricks files. this will help you decide if your on the right way to crochet a long.
•	this cal will be available in english (us), dutch, german, swedish, spanish and french. all thanks to a amazing group of people who helped me on this big project. thats why i want to give a big thanks to wendy de vries for testing and translating the dutch version, tineke tap and anja roseboom for testing, julia veloso for translating the spanish version, christina berberich for testing and translating the german version, celine kavanagh for translating the french version, anette hakansson for translating the swedish version and anna nilson for checking and testing the swedish versionif i haven’t named anything above, please see the post on my blog for any further details and information.

errata dutch version - part 3 : round 4 - start in 6th stitch instead of 7th.

part 8 - round 10 - instead of rv-v it needs to be rv-a.

errata on all versions - part 6 - round 9 - make 1sc-ch2-sc instead of 2sc-ch2-2sc. 

after 4th february 2020 the pattern is updated from above errata’s. 


12/02/20 errata on all versions - part 7 - round 12 : the fpsc is made around the stitch of round 11 instead of round 10.
